fields.summary: Android: Ti.UI.ScrollView never fires postlayout event

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Ti.UI.View should fire a postlayout event just like most of it's subclasses do. It never does, so any UI tests we have relying on post layout listeners time out on Android.

http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Titanium.UI.View-event-postlayout
fields.summary: Android: Ti.UI.View never fires postlayout event

comments.body: This was raised as a result of failing/timing out unit tests. I revisited those tests and can see they do now pass if I no longer skip them.
